comment.author: 59898224@N07
comment._content: Sisal Plantation of which there are many in Tanzania. Sisal is a plant that is used to make rope and string for many uses

comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: Picture shows the sisal fibre put out on racks in the sun to be dried and bleached, after the leaves have been crushed (de-corticated) inside the sisal factory.
